title: The Specialist (1994) Sharon Stone + Stallone (Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111255/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111255/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Croatian (Hrvatski), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish.

(Tip: Click the blue number of Files at top-left to check the contents of this upload and see that your language is really there.)

With Sharon Stone, Sylvester Stallone, James Woods, Eric Roberts and Rod Steiger.

It should be forbidden by law to walk like Sharon Stone does in this explosive action film - so sensuously and self-consciously. I like this movie from the top of her career because it has quite a few spectacular explosions, and because the good guys always win with 'Rocky' in the lead.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x384, really great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
